df = bin_df(df,'dep_var',25)
df.head()
dep_var bin_25 3fold_bin_25
0 5 1-25 0.0
1 69 51-75 2.0
2 52 51-75 1.0
3 90 76-100 2.0
4 25 1-25 0.0

df = kfold_Stratified_df(df,'bin_25',3)
df.groupby('3fold_bin_25').count()

3fold_bin_25

df.groupby(['3fold_bin_25','bin_25']).count().reset_index().sort_values(['bin_25','3fold_bin_25'])
